Class CustomerRecordController

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerRecordController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerRecordController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class controls the GUI elements of customer_record.fxml.
